When I was looking up information on him, I ran into a number of sites that claimed that the photo isn't him (one site claimed it was a Kabuki actor of about the same time dressed up as him).   Appearently, those photos have no way of being proven that it was Okita.   As far as I've read, there is no knowledge that Okita ever did pose for a photograph (itwould be good if someone could answer this for me).
 
Thats not to say the photo isn't him... its more like I'm in the same boat as you are and have no clue whether that really was him or not.
